articles.author: Arjun Kharpal
articles.title: Apple's next iPhone could have a completely new charging system - CNBC
articles.description: Apple's next iPhone could to be equipped with USB-C charging, analysts said, after a European law on common chargers took a step closer to becoming reality.
articles.content:
Customers try out new iPhones at an Apple store as iPhone 14 series go on sale on September 16, 2022 in Shanghai, China.

articles.content: This summer, dengue fever got a foothold in France. Traditionally this viral infection, which is spread by mosquitoes, has been confined to tropical regions including parts of Asia, the Americas and … [+1180 chars]
